Uses of Class
Actor

    • Uses of Actor in <Unnamed>

      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Actor MediaMaker.actor
      If this MediaMaker is an Actor, this is their Actor tag
      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Media.actors
      Stores a list of all actors for a Media object
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Media.getActors()
      Allows a Media objects list of actors to be accessed.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Media.addActor(Actor a)
      Mutator method that adds an actors name to a Media objects list of actors.
      void MediaModel.addObject(Actor a)
      This method adds Actor objects to the model
      void MediaModel.deleteObject(Actor obj)
      This method will delete all instances of the specified Actor object
      void MediaModel.editObject(Actor newActor, MediaMaker oldActor)
      This method edits the specified Actor objects by replacing all old instances of the Actor with the new edited version
      void MediaMaker.setActor(Actor actor)
      This method will set the Actor if this MediaMaker is an Actor in some Media
